title: Avengers: Endgame
assumptions: The overwhelmingly positive fan sentiment (100% net sentiment) indicates strong approval of the movie's narrative choices, including character fates.
User answers regarding Tony Stark's death ('yes') and Captain America's non-death ('no') align with the film's actual plot and contribute to the movie's strong fan reception.
The very high baseline ratings (IMDb 84%, RT 94%) suggest that significant further increases are unlikely, but the strong positive sentiment supports a slight upward adjustment.
Box office prediction reflects sustained interest and moderate ancillary revenue growth due to high fan satisfaction, rather than a significant new theatrical boost.

bestPrediction.title: Avengers: Endgame
assumptions: Overwhelmingly positive fan sentiment (100% net sentiment) indicates strong audience satisfaction and potential for sustained interest.
User acceptance of major plot points, specifically the deaths of Tony Stark and Captain America, suggests these narrative choices resonated positively with the audience.
